issue.title: Managing child metadata
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Child metadata must be managed as the same way parent metadata.
 
A new management action is added to allow user accessing child metadata.
The interface is the same excepting:
- there is no possibility to create a new resource
- a new management action allows users to come back to parent metadata interface
- page's title mentions the parent metadata version the user come from

Such feature is not voted as it does already exist in previous easySDI version.


**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
